game.name: 'n Verlore Verstand
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, VR Supported, Steam Trading Cards, VR Support, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 꿈과 악몽의 현실로 이송 할 준비를하십시오. 당신은 잠재 의식을 통해이 여행에서 자신에 대해 무엇을 발견 할 것인가?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Be prepared to be transported to a reality of dreams and nightmares. What will you discover about yourself in this journey through the subconscious?

reviewHighlights.text: [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/43083373/]Clever games curator review: 4/10[/url]. An eclectic and enigmatic 3D game that ranges from walk...
Empty levels, crooked controls, and a lot of bugs.
